item.title: Overload Problem and few more, URGENT
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

That code you displayed is the code for MAKING a potion, it won’t affect drinking it. Drinking it will be in the Potions.java tab.
It will probably be called “Case (overload Id):”
then the code will be below that. If you post the code it says I can help you figure out which piece of the code requires a level.

As for the bracelets issue, go to “item.java” and go to the section :

There you will see a list of numbers, insert the itemID for the bracelet in that section.

Read full topic

item.title: Overload Problem and few more, URGENT
item.dc:creator: @cderty cderty
item.description:
@cderty wrote:

firstly, my server is saying i need 96 herbablore to DRINK overloads, where would this be changed? im assuming its not this:

if (itemUsed == 269 && useWith == 15308 || itemUsed == 269 && useWith == 15312 || itemUsed == 269 && useWith == 15316 || itemUsed == 269 && useWith == 15320 || itemUsed == 269 && useWith == 15324) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(15308, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15312, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15316, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15320, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(15324, 1)){ if (c.playerLevel[c.playerHerblore] >= 96) { c.getItems().deleteItem(269, c.getItems().getItemSlot(269),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(15308, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15308),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(15312, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15312),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(15316, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15316),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(15320, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15320),1); c.getItems().deleteItem(15324, c.getItems().getItemSlot(15324),1); c.getItems().addItem(15332,1);

Also, is it client sided that changes where items are worn? because bracelets are weilding as weapons?

Finally the big one, Mysql help, how do i add auto donate/auto vote? im a newbie at mysql and cant find any guides fro beginners!

thanks you

Read full topic
